member.name: T:Twilio.HttpStatusCodeResult
member.summary: Returns an HTTP status code

member.name: M:Twilio.HttpStatusCodeResult.#ctor(System.Net.HttpStatusCode)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a specific status code

member.name: P:Twilio.HttpStatusCodeResult.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets the status code for this instance

member.name: T:Twilio.Mvc.SmsRequest
member.summary: This class can be used as the parameter on your SMS action. Incoming parameters will be bound here.

member.name: T:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest
member.summary: Base class for mapping incoming request parameters into a strongly typed object

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.AccountSid
member.summary: Your Twilio account id. It is 34 characters long, and always starts with the letters AC

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.From
member.summary: The phone number or client identifier of the party that initiated the call
member.remarks: Phone numbers are formatted with a '+' and country code, e.g. +16175551212 (E.164 format). Client identifiers begin with the client: URI scheme; for example, for a call from a client named 'tommy', the From parameter will be client:tommy.

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.To
member.summary: The phone number or client identifier of the called party
member.remarks: Phone numbers are formatted with a '+' and country code, e.g. +16175551212 (E.164 format). Client identifiers begin with the client: URI scheme; for example, for a call to a client named 'jenny', the To parameter will be client:jenny.

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.FromCity
member.summary: The city of the caller

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.FromState
member.summary: The state or province of the caller

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.FromZip
member.summary: The postal code of the caller

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.FromCountry
member.summary: The country of the caller

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.ToCity
member.summary: The city of the called party

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.ToState
member.summary: The state or province of the called party

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.ToZip
member.summary: The postal code of the called party

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.TwilioRequest.ToCountry
member.summary: The country of the called party

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.SmsRequest.SmsSid
member.summary: A 34 character unique identifier for the message. May be used to later retrieve this message from the REST API

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.SmsRequest.Body
member.summary: The text body of the SMS message. Up to 160 characters long

member.name: T:Twilio.Mvc.StatusCallbackRequest
member.summary: This class can be used as the parameter on your StatusCallback action. Incoming parameters will be bound here.

member.name: T:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest
member.summary: This class can be used as the parameter on your voice action. Incoming parameters will be bound here.

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.CallSid
member.summary: A unique identifier for this call, generated by Twilio

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.CallStatus
member.summary: A descriptive status for the call. The value is one of queued, ringing, in-progress, completed, busy, failed or no-answer

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.ApiVersion
member.summary: The version of the Twilio API used to handle this call. For incoming calls, this is determined by the API version set on the called number. For outgoing calls, this is the API version used by the outgoing call's REST API request

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.Direction
member.summary: Indicates the direction of the call. In most cases this will be inbound, but if you are using Dial it will be outbound-dial

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.ForwardedFrom
member.summary: This parameter is set only when Twilio receives a forwarded call, but its value depends on the caller's carrier including information when forwarding. Not all carriers support passing this information

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.CallerName
member.summary: This parameter is set when the IncomingPhoneNumber that received the call has had its VoiceCallerIdLookup value set to true.

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.Digits
member.summary: When used with the Gather verb, the digits the caller pressed, excluding the finishOnKey digit if used. When used with the Record verb, the key (if any) pressed to end the recording or 'hangup' if the caller hung up

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.RecordingUrl
member.summary: The URL of the recorded audio. When the result of a transcription, the URL for the transcription's source recording resource.

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.RecordingDuration
member.summary: The duration of the recorded audio (in seconds)

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.TranscriptionSid
member.summary: The unique 34 character ID of the transcription

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.TranscriptionText
member.summary: Contains the text of the transcription

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.TranscriptionStatus
member.summary: The status of the transcription attempt: either 'completed' or 'failed'

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.TranscriptionUrl
member.summary: The URL for the transcription's REST API resource

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.RecordingSid
member.summary: The unique 34 character ID of the recording from which the transcription was generated

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.DialCallStatus
member.summary: The outcome of the Dial attempt. See the DialCallStatus section below for details

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.DialCallSid
member.summary: The call sid of the new call leg. This parameter is not sent after dialing a conference

member.name: P:Twilio.Mvc.VoiceRequest.DialCallDuration
member.summary: The duration in seconds of the dialed call. This parameter is not sent after dialing a conference

member.name: T:Twilio.TwiML.Mvc.TwilioController
member.summary: Extends the standard base controller to simplify returning a TwiML response

member.name: M:Twilio.TwiML.Mvc.TwilioController.TwiML(Twilio.TwiML.TwilioResponse)
member.summary: Returns a property formatted TwiML response

member.name: T:Twilio.TwiML.Mvc.ValidateRequestAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that is used to prevent forgery of a request.

member.name: M:Twilio.TwiML.Mvc.ValidateRequestAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ValidateRequestAttribute class.

member.name: M:Twilio.TwiML.Mvc.ValidateRequestAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ValidateRequestAttribute class.
